General.Name: Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Co Ltd
General.Description: Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of wine, brandy, and sparkling wine in China, France, Spain, Chile, and Australia. It is also involved in grape growing and acquisition; and travel resource development activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yantai, China. Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Company Limited is a subsidiary of Yantai Changyu Group Company Limited.
General.Address: No. 56 Da Ma Lu, Yantai, China, 264000
